Posts.Content: Oct 28, 2012 03:30PM NaniAlice wrote: I really like what Jennifer said..test don't make the disease the just monitor it. That really put it in perspective. We freak out with ever test with all the changing numbers. But the reality is, the cancer is the enemy not the test. Everything about stage IV sucks. Some days its hard to see through the depressing haze. But then somewhere, somehow, we find that little something that gets us through another day.. Keep up the fight. Hugs from Alice.
Posts.Title: Just one of those days stellaratovsky NaniAlice

Posts.Content: Oct 29, 2012 08:04PM NaniAlice wrote: We're still getting winds and surges of rain here in NC. I can only imagine how it is for those of you in the NE. Stay safe. Hugs
